GAMEPLAY_SundialDescription.English: A simple sundial. Useful during the day... that's about it.
GAMEPLAY_SundialDescription.Russian: Простые солнечные часы. Полезны, пока светит солнце.
GAMEPLAY_SundialDescription.Turkish: Basit bir güneş saati. Gündüzleri işe yarar... hepsi bu.
GAMEPLAY_SundialDescription.Italian: Una semplice meridiana. Utile durante il giorno... ma questo è tutto.

GAMEPLAY_StopwatchDescription.English: A sturdy stopwatch. Will face the fiercest conditions alongside you.
GAMEPLAY_StopwatchDescription.Russian: Прочный секундомер. Выдержит с вами самые жесткие условия.
GAMEPLAY_StopwatchDescription.Turkish: Sağlam bir kronometre. Sizinle birlikte en zorlu koşullarla yüzleşecek.
GAMEPLAY_StopwatchDescription.Italian: Un cronometro robusto. Affronterà le condizioni più feroci insieme a te.

GAMEPLAY_AnalogWatchDescription.English: A classic analog wristwatch. Perfect for the apocalypse.
GAMEPLAY_AnalogWatchDescription.Russian: Классические наручные часы. Идеальны для апокалипсиса.
GAMEPLAY_AnalogWatchDescription.Turkish: Klasik analog kol saati. Kıyamet için mükemmel.
GAMEPLAY_AnalogWatchDescription.Italian: Un classico orologio analogico. Perfetto per l'apocalisse.

GAMEPLAY_DigitalWatchDescription.English: An average-looking digital wristwatch. Tells the time to the exact minute.
GAMEPLAY_DigitalWatchDescription.Russian: Обычные цифровые наручные часы. Показывают время с точностью до минуты.
GAMEPLAY_DigitalWatchDescription.Turkish: Ortalama görünümlü dijital bir kol saati. Saati tam dakikasına kadar söyler.
GAMEPLAY_DigitalWatchDescription.Italian: Un orologio da polso digitale di aspetto medio. Indica l'ora al minuto esatto.

GAMEPLAY_CheckingSundialIndoors.English: Unable to check the Sundial indoors
GAMEPLAY_CheckingSundialIndoors.Russian: Невозможно использовать солнечные часы в помещении
GAMEPLAY_CheckingSundialIndoors.Italian: Impossibile controllare l'ora con la Meridiana all'interno

GAMEPLAY_CheckingSundialNightTime.English: Unable to check the Sundial during the night
GAMEPLAY_CheckingSundialNightTime.Russian: Невозможно использовать солнечные часы после захода солнца
GAMEPLAY_CheckingSundialNightTime.Italian: Impossibile controllare l'ora con la Meridiana durante la notte

GAMEPLAY_CheckingSundialWeather.English: Unable to check the Sundial during bad weather
GAMEPLAY_CheckingSundialWeather.Russian: Невозможно использовать солнечные часы в плохую погоду
GAMEPLAY_CheckingSundialWeather.Turkish: Kötü hava koşullarında Güneş Saati'ni kontrol edemiyorum
GAMEPLAY_CheckingSundialWeather.Italian: Impossibile controllare l'ora con la Meridiana durante il maltempo
